summary: Tested Client Preview Panel implementation on Clients page. All 14 features tested and working correctly. Preview panel slides in from right when clicking a client, shows case type badge, client info, task progress, key tasks specific to case type (Probate vs Estate Planning), and all 4 action buttons (Open Case, Close Case, Archive Case, Add Task). Add Task modal has required fields. Probate Case Detail progress bar shows correct 5 stages matching Airtable and stages are clickable.

minor.issue: Console shows 422 errors for some API calls (likely related to task dates or linked records), but doesn't affect main functionality

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

passed_tests: TEST 1: Client Preview Panel shows when clicking on a client in the clients list - PASS
TEST 2: Preview panel displays correct case type badge (Probate/Estate Planning) - PASS
TEST 3: Preview panel shows client information (name, email, phone, sign up date) - PASS
TEST 4: Preview panel shows Task Progress with correct progress circle - PASS
TEST 5: Preview panel shows Key Tasks specific to case type (Probate has different tasks than Estate Planning) - PASS
TEST 6: Open Case button navigates to the correct case detail page (/case/probate/{id}) - PASS
TEST 7: Close Case button is present and enabled - PASS
TEST 8: Archive Case button is present and enabled - PASS
TEST 9: Add Task button opens the Add Task modal - PASS
TEST 10: Add Task modal has Task Name (required), Due Date, and Notes fields - PASS
TEST 11: Close button (X) on preview panel closes the panel - PASS
TEST 12: Clicking backdrop closes the preview panel - PASS
TEST 13: Probate Case Detail page progress bar shows 5 stages matching Airtable: Pre-Opening, Estate Opened, Creditor Notification Period, Administration, Estate Closed - PASS
TEST 14: Progress bar stages are clickable and update the case stage (verified with success toast) - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Client Preview Panel implementation is complete and well-structured
slide-in-right animation is properly defined in index.css
data-testid attributes are correctly added for testing (client-preview-panel, close-preview-btn, open-case-btn, add-task-btn, close-case-btn, archive-case-btn)
ProbateProgressBar component correctly shows 5 stages matching Airtable options
Task progress calculation functions (calculateProbateProgress, calculateEstatePlanningProgress) are properly implemented
Key Tasks preview shows different tasks for Probate vs Estate Planning cases
context_for_next_testing_agent: Client Preview Panel feature is fully implemented and tested. All action buttons work correctly. Probate progress bar has 5 clickable stages. Estate Planning preview shows different key tasks than Probate. The slide-in-right animation is defined in index.css. Minor console warnings about DialogContent accessibility can be addressed in future iterations.
